price: 29. Baye bandimaki mpe basalaki misala milamu, bakozalaka na bomoyi bwa kitoko o mokolo mwa suka, mpe bozongi elamu.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ طُوبَىٰ لَهُمۡ وَحُسۡنُ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ṭūbā lahum waḥus'nu maābin
